ygData.subject: Re: Greetings fellow bards!
ygData.msgSnippet: The Everquesting Bard is a nice site with a good song list: http://amtgard.pinkpig.com/bards/eqbard.htm. or i have a song list in microsoft excel format with
ygData.messageBody:
The Everquesting Bard is a nice site with a good song list:
http://amtgard.pinkpig.com/bards/eqbard.htm.

or i have a song list in microsoft excel format with song, level, effects,
and where to buy. email me at zed22@... and i will reply with it.

Shada Silverleaf, Level 41 Bard, Mithaniel Marr


-----Original Message-----
From: Symber Ash [mailto:symber1@...]
Sent: Saturday, June 05, 1999 3:15 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] Greetings fellow bards!


From: "Symber Ash" <symber1@...>

Greetings everyone! I am a new list member, and I am glad to see that this
list is active! I began playing a wizard, and then switched to a bard to see
if it was any fun or not...I haven't played the wizard since<G>.

I also run a fanfiction site for EverQuest. The site carries fanfiction
from all races and classes, but I'd like to begin a bard section...we are,
afterall, the musicians and poets of Norrath..let's put it to good use!
The site addy is:
http://www.homelessproductions.com/ash/eq

I have been looking on the internet for good sites on our songs...none seem
to be good enough. Does anyone know of a website that has the details on
all of our songs?


Thanks,
Ryndal, 14th lvl half-elf bard, of Freeport
